column4: I'm seeing lines in my syslog for a failed modprobe of 'xen_blkfront' - how can I track down what's causing these?
that's just a grep of them for today
maybe you need to be running on a xen kernel for the modules to work ? is that the case ?
I don't have anything to do with xen... I'm just trying to work out why the module is trying to load in the first place
seems to trigger when some crontabs run.. but I dont see it listed anywhere in my crons
i dunno what may be happening... you can ask in #ubuntu-server maybe there is someone there who knows
